ReasonOfCreation.title: Why I created this app
ReasonOfCreation.content:
I started this project with my close friends and family in mind, as well as myself. 
 I wanted to create something useful to me and others, so I thought about things and apps they usually use and tried to think of a way to make it easier for them to manage all they need. Most usually they used notes, todo-lists, shopping lists, communicated with their family about what to buy, if they have something at home or not â†’ and usually what they used was just a basic chat and their phones' note app. 

 So, I thought about creating something tethered to them, an app that would allow them to create notes that were shared across devices easily, todo-lists, possibly a schedule-manager, daily planner, household management with shopping lists and finances and whatnot.
